Verses: 1 dhevane, Ennai Ratchiyum; Vellangal En Aaththumaamattum Perugivarugiradhu.
2 aazhamaana Ulaiyil Amizhndhirukkiren; Nirka Nilaiyillai, Nilaiyaadha Jalaththil Aazhndhirukkiren; Vellangal Enmel Purandupogiradhu.
3 naan Kooppidugiradhinaal Ilaiththen; En Thondai Varandupoyitru; En Dhevanukku Naan Kaaththirukkaiyaal, En Kangal Pooththuppoyitru.

4 nimiththamillaamal Ennaip Pagaikkiravargal En Thalaimayirilum Adhigamaayirukkiraargal; Veenaaga Enakkuch Saththurukkalaagi Ennaich Sangarikkavendumendrirukkiravargal Balaththirukkiraargal; Naan Eduththukkollaadhadhai Naan Kodukkavendiyadhaayitru.
5 dhevane, Neer En Buththiyeenaththai Arindhirukkireer; En Kutrangal Umakku Maraindhirukkavillai.

6 senaigalin Karththaraagiya Aandavare, Umakkaagak Kaaththirukkiravargal Ennimiththam Vetkappattuppogaadhiruppaargalaaga; Isravelin Dhevane, Ummaith Thedugiravargal Ennimiththam Naanamadaiyaadhiruppaargalaaga.
7 umadhunimiththam Nindhaiyaich Sagiththen; Lachchai En Mugaththai Mooditru.
8 en Sagodhararukku Vetru Manushanum, En Thaayin Pillaigalukku Anniyanumaanen.
9 ummudaiya Veettaikkuriththu Undaana Pagdhivairaakkiyam Ennaip Patchiththadhu; Ummai Nindhikkiravargaludaiya Nindhanaigal Enmel Vizhundhadhu.
10 en Aaththumaa Vaadumpadi Ubavaasiththu Azhudhen; Adhuvum Enakku Nindhaiyaai Mudindhadhu.
11 rattai En Uduppaakkinen; Appozhudhum Avargalukkup Pazhamozhiyaanen.
12 vaasalil Utkaarndhirukkiravargal Enakku Virodhamaaip Pesugiraargal; Madhubaanampannugiravargalin Paadalaanen.
13 aanaalum Karththaave, Anukgiragakaalaththile Ummai Nokki Vinnappanj Seygiren; Dhevane, Umadhu Migundha Kirubaiyinaalum Umadhu Ratchippin Saththiyaththinaalum Enakkuch Sevikoduththarulum.
14 naan Amizhndhippogaadhapadikkuch Setrinindru Ennaith Thookkividum; Ennaip Pagaikkiravargalinindrum Nilaiyaadha Jalaththinindrum Naan Neengumpadi Seyyum.
15 jalappiravaagangal Enmel Puralaamalum, Aazham Ennai Vizhungaamalum, Paadhaalam Enmel Than Vaayai Adaiththukkollaamalum Iruppadhaaga.
16 karththaave, En Vinnappaththaik Kettarulum, Ummudaiya Dhayai Nalamaayirukkiradhu; Umadhu Urukkamaana Irakkangalinpadi Ennaik Kadaatchiththarulum.
17 umadhu Mugaththai Umadhu Adiyenukku Maraiyaadheyum; Naan Viyaagulappadugiren, Enakkuth Theeviramaaich Sevikoduththarulum.
18 neer En Aaththumaavinidaththil Vandhu Adhai Vidudhalaipannum; En Saththurukkalinimiththam Ennai Meettuvidum.
19 dhevareer En Nindhaiyaiyum En Vetkaththaiyum En Avamaanaththaiyum Arindhirukkireer; En Saththurukkal Ellaarum Umakku Munbaaga Irukkiraargal.

20 nindhai En Irudhayaththaip Pilandhadhu; Naan Migavum Vedhanaippadugiren; Enakkaaga Paridhabikkiravanundo Endru Kaaththirundhen Oruvanum Illai; Thetrugiravargalukkuk Kaaththirundhen, Oruvanaiyum Kaanen.
21 en Aagaaraththil Kasappuk Kalandhu Koduththaargal, En Thaagaththukkuk Kaadiyaik Kudikkakkoduththaargal.
22 avargaludaiya Pandhi Avargalukkuk Kanniyum, Avargaludaiya Selvam Avargalukku Valaiyumaayirukkakkadavadhu.
23 avargaludaiya Kangal Kaanaadhapadi Andhagaarappadakkadavadhu; Avargal Iduppugalai Eppodhum Thallaadappannum.
24 ummudaiya Ukkiraththai Avargalmel Ootrum; Ummudaiya Kobaakkini Avargalaith Thodarndhu Pidippadhaaga.
25 avargal Vaasasthalam Paazhaagakkadavadhu; Avargaludaiya Koodaarangalil Kudiyillaamarpovadhaaga.
26 dhevareer Adiththavanai Avargal Thunbappaduththi, Neer Kaayappaduththinavargalai Nogap Pesugiraargale.
27 akkiramaththinmel Akkiramaththai Avargalmel Sumaththum, Avargal Umadhu Needhikku Vandhettaadhiruppaargalaaga.
28 jeevapusthagaththilirundhu Avargalper Kirukkappattuppovadhaaga; Needhimaangal Perode Avargal Per Ezhudhappadaadhiruppadhaaga.
29 naano Sirumaiyum Thuyaramumullavan; Dhevane, Ummudaiya Ratchippu Enakku Uyarndha Adaikkalamaavadhaaga.
30 dhevanudaiya Naamaththaip Paattinaal Thudhiththu, Avarai Sthoththiraththinaal Magimaippaduththuven.
31 kombum Virikulambumulla Kaalaiyerudhaippaarkkilum, Idhuve Karththarukkup Piriyamaayirukkum.
32 saandhagunamullavargal Idhaik Kandu Sandhoshappaduvaargal; Dhevanaith Thedugiravargale, Ungal Irudhayam Vaazhum.
33 karththar Eliyavarkgalin Vinnappaththaik Ketkiraar, Kattunda Thammudaiyavargalai Avar Purakkaniyaar.
34 vaanamum Boomiyum Samuththirangalum Avaigalil Sanjarikkira Yaavum Avaraith Thudhikkakkadavadhu.
35 dhevan Seeyonai Ratchiththu, Yoodhaavin Pattanangalaik Kattuvaar; Appozhudhu Ange Kudiyirundhu Adhaich Sudhandhariththukkolvaargal.
36 avarudaiya Oozhiyakkaararin Sandhadhiyaar Adhaich Sudhandhariththukkolvaargal; Avarudaiya Naamaththai Nesikkiravargal Adhil Vaasamaayiruppaargal.
